name: OpenPhone
headline: The all-in-one business phone for teams.
description: OpenPhone is the modern business phone system. It comes with powerful calling, messaging, and a lightweight CRM. Works great for individuals and teams. It allows you to share a phone number with teammates, like an inbox. Available on Mac, Windows, Web, iOS, and Android.

# The best phone system for teams
OpenPhone brings your calls, texts, and contacts into a collaborative workspace. Build stronger customer relationships and respond faster with shared numbers, AI, and automations.
[Try for free](https://www.openphone.com/<https:/my.openphone.com/signup>)

## Connect with customers effortlessly
OpenPhone is a powerful business phone system in an intuitive app that works across all your existing devices.
### Get numbers for any use case
Organize conversations by assigning numbers to your specific business and customer needs.Set up new local US and Canadian phone numbers, along with North American toll-free numbers in minutes. Or [port your existing ones](https://www.openphone.com/</porting>).
[Port your number![arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/67406a8af60aea1c4b5bd53c_arrow-right-line%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.openphone.com/</porting>)
![Numbers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6384fdd9fd42380b529fc942/66983593407aac9f0927bfcb_Inboxe%20-%20Numbers.avif)
### Calls and texts in one unified view
See call logs, messages, recordings, and voicemails in a single conversation for each contact.Never lose context with the history of each customer relationship in one place.

### OpenPhone Overview

#### Company Snapshot:
- **Name**: OpenPhone
- **Founded**: 2018
- **Location**: San Francisco, CA
- **Team Size**: 125 employees
- **Batch**: Y Combinator Batch S18
- **Website**: [OpenPhone](https://www.openphone.com)
- **Group Partner**: Michael Seibel
- **Tags**: SaaS, San Francisco Bay Area

#### Mission:
OpenPhone aims to be the all-in-one business phone system for teams, simplifying communication with powerful tools designed for both individuals and collaborative teams.

#### Product Offering:
OpenPhone is more than just a calling serviceâ€”it's a modern phone system that integrates calling, messaging, and a lightweight CRM. Key features include:
- **Shared Phone Numbers**: Teams can share a single number, enhancing collaboration.
- **Cross-Platform**: Accessible on Mac, Windows, Web, iOS, and Android.
- **Unified Communication**: Calls, texts, and contacts are centralized for a seamless user experience.
- **AI Features**: Automated call summaries, transcripts, and intelligent follow-up suggestions that streamline workflows.
- **Integrations**: Works with popular tools like Zapier, HubSpot, and Salesforce, allowing users to connect their existing tech stack easily.

#### Target Audience:
OpenPhone caters primarily to startups and small businesses, but its flexibility makes it suitable for various industries, including education, real estate, and professional services.

#### Why It Matters:
In a world where communication is key to business success, OpenPhone offers a modern, efficient alternative to traditional business phone systems. By leveraging shared resources and innovative technology, it helps teams respond faster to customer needs and fosters stronger relationships.

#### Customer Base:
OpenPhone accounts for over 50,000 businesses, serving a mix of fast-growing startups and established institutions, giving it a significant footprint in the business communications sector.

In short, OpenPhone challenges the conventional business phone paradigm with a solution that's as collaborative as it is powerful. Whether you're in a startup trying to scale or an established business looking for efficiency, OpenPhone provides the tools to keep your team connected and your customers happy.
